name: Russian Spanish Translator
description: This free app is able to translate words and text from Russian to Spanish, and from Spanish to Russian. Best app for easy and fast translations, which can be used like a dictionary. If you are a student, tourist or traveler , it will helps you to learn the language!   This translator contains the following features: - Translate words and sentences - Translate from clipboard - Simple and user-friendly interface - Instant search - Instant start             . Traductor gratuito del Ruso al espaol y del espaol al ruso.
